job.title: Principal Full-Stack Data Scientist / Data Engineer
job.description: We are focused on building the largest ecommerce platform in the world Founded by a team of seasoned exAmazon operators Acquco strategically acquires the best brands and accelerates their growth across Amazon Walmart Shopify and other ecommerce ecosystems Weve raised over 160M of institutional capital since our inception in 2020 and are focused on rapidly scaling our portfolio teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtIn the News ltstronggtRecently featured on Techcrunch Crunchbase Business Insider Pymnts PitchbookltbrgtltbrgtThe Data ampamp Analytics team at Acquco is responsible for driving the vision and execution of developing data assets and insights central to Acqucos business and technology strategy Utilizing proprietary models ampamp datasets the team will be generating datadriven insights across our investments and operational decision making processes The team will build the data infrastructure to empower technical analysis and answer critical business questionsltbrgtltbrgtAcquco is seeking a Principal Full Stack Data ScientistData Engineer to deliver endtoend data solutions In addition to training statistical models and building data infrastructure youll be engaging with business divisions to definescope questions and validate your solutionsanswersltbrgtltbrgtYou will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic fastpaced environment with exceptional growth potential learningworking across all business areas gaining full stack experience and seeing immediate impactusage of your data
